page.title: 16Clubs In East Huntspill
page.content: We were surprised at the number of active clubs in the village.There are 15 in total,ranging from Mother's Union to Darts,from Ladies Keep Fit to Cricket. The Women's Institute is one of the thriving organisations.It has been going for more than ten years now and has more than twenty-five regular members.The Institute have six trophies of various kinds.They take part in a local skittles league in which they have won several trophies. The Women's Institute meet once a month at 7.30pm in the Church Hall.There is a wide age range present,but the activities are carried out together.
